mapper.select: select distinct id, new_lab from es_data_center.search_data_label_zwy
select new_id newId , id , old_key_no_blank oldKeyNoBlank , searchkey searchKey, lab, old_key oldKey , old_code oldCode from es_data_center.search_data_label_zwy where ${whereSql} order by new_id

update.foreach: update es_data_center.search_data_label_zwy set new_lab = #{item.newLab} where id = #{item.id}
update es_data_center.search_data_label set lab = #{item.new_lab} ,author = 'zhuwy' where id = #{item.id}
